sections.title: 3D printed dentures in Shoreham-by-Sea
sections.body: Digitally designed dentures with controlled fit, gum characterisation, and faster turnaround from our in-house lab.

ctas.label: Plan a clinician-led 3d printed dentures review

sections.eyebrow: Why patients choose our digital dentures
sections.title: Comfort, fit, and clinical oversight
items: Scans replace most physical impressions for comfort
Multiple try-in stages planned to refine bite
In-house printing reduces remakes and wait times
Gum shading and surface character can be personalised
Clear guidance on maintenance and relines

sections.title: Digitally planned dentures with faster feedback loops
sections.body: 3D printed dentures use digital scans and design software to map tooth position, bite, and gum contour. The digital file lets us adjust fit and aesthetics quickly while keeping the treating clinician in control.
bullets: Design preview for tooth position and smile
Try-ins to refine comfort and occlusion
Printed bases and teeth with gum characterisation
Adjustments and relines supported by stored files

sections.title: Patients needing stability and a predictable fit
items: New denture wearers wanting a calmer, scan-led process
Existing denture wearers seeking better retention or comfort
Patients needing quicker replacements without compromising fit
Those interested in personalised gum tinting
People who value clear maintenance plans

sections.title: Digitally staged from scan to fit
items: Consultation and digital scan
Design preview for bite and smile position
Try-in or printed prototype for comfort checks
Final denture printed with gum characterisation
Fit appointment with occlusion and pressure checks
Follow-up for relines or refinements as needed
sections.strapline: We outline timelines and review points before we begin.

sections.title: Scans, design software, and calibrated printers
sections.body: High-accuracy scanners and calibrated printers help us achieve consistent fit and colour. Designs stay on file so adjustments or remakes are efficient and clinician-reviewed.

sections.title: Keeping your dentures stable
items: Cleaning guidance to protect the printed surfaces
Reline and review schedule explained upfront
Bite and pressure points checked after settling
Materials discussed, including when a lab-made option is advised
Storage and handling tips to avoid warping

faqs.question: How fast can 3D printed dentures be made?
faqs.answer: Turnaround is typically faster than traditional methods because scanning and in-house printing reduce lab transit. We confirm timelines after your assessment.

faqs.question: Will they feel different to traditional dentures?
faqs.answer: Digital design aims for improved comfort and retention. We plan try-ins and adjustments to ensure the fit is right for you.

faqs.question: Can colours be customised?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer gum characterisation and tooth shades guided by your clinician to keep results natural.

faqs.question: What if I need a reline or repair?
faqs.answer: Stored digital files let us reprint or adjust efficiently, with the clinician checking bite and pressure points to avoid repeating issues.

faqs.question: Are printed dentures right for everyone?
faqs.answer: Not always. We’ll advise if a different material or lab-made option is more appropriate based on your bite, bone support, and aesthetic goals.

sections.title: When this fits and what else to consider
sections.body: In our clinic we usually stage this after extractions and oral surgery (/treatments/extractions-and-oral-surgery) so the plan stays safe and measured.
bullets: Appropriate when you want to understand whether 3d printed dentures are appropriate and how they are made.
Often follows Extractions and oral surgery (/treatments/extractions-and-oral-surgery); Gum health management (/treatments/periodontal-gum-care).
Alternatives we balance: Senior smile care (/treatments/senior-mature-smile-care); Comfort sedation (/treatments/sedation-dentistry).

Next steps we plan for: Implant-retained dentures (/treatments/implants-retained-dentures); Implant consultation (/treatments/implants-consultation); Aftercare and hygiene (/treatments/implants-aftercare).

sections.title: Plan digital dentures with clinician oversight
sections.body: Book a consultation to see how digital scanning and in-house printing could support a comfortable, stable denture fit.
